--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "CatMaster o" <catmastero@y...> wrote:
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> 
wrote:
> > Flicker sighs as Nightlight vanishes underground.  "Too late, 
> > Maximals," he snarls, "she's gone!"
> > 
> > He aims his plasma rifle to nail Owlhawk from behind, but is shot 
> > from behind himself by Empath before he can pull the trigger.  
> > Cursing, he gets up and flies out of the way before he gets 
caught in 
> > a crossfire.
> > 
> 
> Kenzo decended to get in closer, he aimed his laser at Flicker and
> fired.  "you'll pay for this crime!" he exclaimed angerly.

Flicker gets caught across the shoulder and returns fire with his own 
weapon.  "I beg to differ."
